slide.title: Lab Goals
slide.p: The purpose of this lab is to expose you to one way to incorporate an addin for your CodeIgniter webapp.

I originally had more comprehensive plans, incorporating a helper and adding some maintenance pages, but decided that those were not appropriate at this point. The formfields_helper that I mentioned in class is in the starter file, in case you wish to explore it on your own.
Suggestion: you may want to skim the slideshow first, before working your way through it.

slide.title: Lab Submission
slide.p: Your lab is tutorial "ci-normal05", and will be completed in a github repository. This will be your (forked) starter-caboose repo.
You may work on your own or use pair programming.
Please make sure that your work is in the "master" branch or your repository, when done, and that any other branch(es) have been merged into it.
Submit a readme to the lab dropbox, with a link to your github repository.

slide.title: Lab Marking Guideline
slide.p: I have chosen to keep this lab purposefully easy, so as to give you all an opportunity to complete it without impacting your preparations for midterm week.

ul.li: Incorporating Caboose into the master view template ... 2
Adding and configuring the rating widget for use with Caboose ... 3
Applying the rating widget to the two views described ... 2
Observing proper gitflow workflow (forking, branching, signing, not messing up the database config) ... 3
